name: Asia Brain Spine Nerve Medical Centre

reviews.text: My 10yo daughter had severe intense headache, ringing ear and neck stiffness for 3 months, she's not able to do school or any activity normal kids will do..thanks to Dr.Timothy Lee and Dr.Manish she's now back to normal, a happy and bright girl again. Thank you so much Dr. Lee and Dr.Manish, God bless you

Worst clinic I ever experienced

1. He asked me to do a MRI for leg pain and after MRI told me he only cure spine but not legs, which he could told me in the first place.ðŸ˜¤

2. More expensive: 250$ for 1st visit and 200$ for subsequent. And if you donâ€™t visit in a while, they consider you 1st visit again ðŸ™€

Avoid it and find a more professional clinic.
